name: Van Rysel XCR

#Skilled
#M

name: XCR Tri Ultegra Di2

#Skilled
#S

Fork: Carbon fiber

Saddle & Seatpost: Ergonomic triathlon saddle
Pedals: Not included.

name: Cervélo P2 105 Time Trial Bike
description:
#Intermediate
#S

The Cervelo P2 is an entry-level time trial bike designed for speed, comfort, and precise handling. Its aerodynamic frame features a giant seat tube that shields the rear wheel and sleek internal cable routing to reduce drag. The bike's thoughtful design includes a slim hourglass head tube and a recessed fork crown to minimize wind resistance. While the bike excels in performance and comfort, its brake setup favors a right-hand rear brake for optimal cable routing and maintenance.

Frame: Carbon fiber
Fork: Cervélo All-Carbon, Tapered P2 Fork
Wheels: Shimano RS500 alloy wheels
Drivetrain: Shimano 105, 52/36 crankset, 11-28 cassette
Brakes: Rim brakes
Cockpit: 3T Vola Team aerobars
Saddle & Seatpost: Prologo TGALE PAS
Pedals: Not included.

name: MAGENE L308 Intelligent Taillight
description:
#Advanced

-96 COB LED lights enable you to freely customize. You can create static patterns, GIFs, scrolling messages by sketching on OnelapFit App.
-Can store up to 15 creations and easy to use. Switch with just 1 button.
-Smart braking sensor combines both fun & safety. Detect even slight braking and enter a 3-second high-intensity flashing mode to alert rear vehicles and pedestrians.
-Auto-sleep & auto-wake to get rid of battery anxiety. It can reach a maximum battery life of 50 hours and supports real-time battery display.
-Maximum visual distance at night reaches 800 meters to enhance safety.
-2 yrs warranty

name: MAGENE C606 SMART GPS
description:
#Advanced

Screen Revolution
With a 2.8” color touchscreen, enhanced coating, and Asahi glass, elevate your cycling control with style! 
Seamless Connectivity
Stay connected on the go with lightning-fast Wifi and Bluetooth capabilities. Enjoy rapid map downloads, data uploads & ultra-fast positioning.
Advanced Navigation
Navigate with confidence using turn-by-turn map navigation, GPX files import & global maps download.
Magene Smart Riding Assistant 
Transform C606 into the control core of your ride. Enjoy smart control, personalized reminders, and notifications for a safer and more enjoyable ride.
Rich Data Display
With 103 key data items in 13 categories, dive into scientific data analysis and rich display ways
Indoor Training Master
Relive outdoor terrains with FIT file uploads and freely adjust power, resistance, and gradient. Indoor as outdoors!

name: Ceepo Rindo Gravel Frameset
description:
#Advanced

Small and Medium available
An aero gravel performance platform at ease on race courses as well as gravel adventures.
The Rindō, Japanese for “remote forest road” applies our aerodynamic expertise to gravel racing and mixed terrain adventure. Sure, the Rindo is a gravel bike, but not just any gravel bike. It is, in fact, exactly the kind of gravel bike you would expect from Ceepo: a race-oriented carbon aero gravel superbike designed to go fast over a variety of terrain regardless of the conditions.

name: Topeak Shuttle Gauge Digital
description:
#Intermediate

Easy-to-read digital gauge can be attached to a pump or used alone and provides accurate pressure readings up to 300psi / 20.7bar. Rotating head works with Presta, Schrader or Dunlop valves on bike / motorcycle / car tires, forks or shocks while the Thumb Lock lever ensures an airtight seal. The air release button allows fine tuning pressure.
